import requests
import json
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageTextInput, DropdownInput, Output
from langflow.schema import Data

# Component Criado Por Fabricando Sua Ideia Se Inscreva no Canal: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais
# Component Created By Making Your Idea Subscribe to the Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class TesseractOCRComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Tesseract OCR"
    description = "Extract text from images using Tesseract Server."
    documentation: str = "https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais"
    icon = "camera"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="server_url",
            display_name="Tesseract Server URL",
            info="URL do servidor Tesseract (exemplo: http://127.0.0.1:8884/tesseract).",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="image_path",
            display_name="Caminho da Imagem",
            info="Caminho do arquivo da imagem para OCR.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="language",
            display_name="Idioma",
            options=["eng", "deu", "fra", "rus", "spa", "por"],
            info="Idioma para reconhecimento de texto (Tesseract OCR).",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="page_segmentation_mode",
            display_name="Modo de Segmentação",
            options=[str(i) for i in range(14)],
            info="Modo de segmentação de página do Tesseract (PSM).",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="ocr_engine_mode",
            display_name="Modo de OCR",
            options=["0", "1", "2", "3"],
            info="Modo de OCR Engine do Tesseract.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Texto Extraído", name="ocr_text", method="extract_text"),
    ]

    def extract_text(self) -> Data:
        server_url = self.server_url.strip() if self.server_url else ""
        image_path = self.image_path.strip() if self.image_path else ""
        language = self.language or "eng"
        psm = self.page_segmentation_mode or "3"
        oem = self.ocr_engine_mode or "3"

        if not server_url:
            return Data(data={"ocr_text": "Erro: URL do servidor não informada."})

        if not image_path:
            return Data(data={"ocr_text": "Erro: Caminho da imagem não informado."})

        try:
            with open(image_path, "rb") as image_file:
                options = {
                    "languages": [language],
                    "pageSegmentationMethod": int(psm),
                    "ocrEngineMode": int(oem),
                }

                files = {
                    "options": (None, json.dumps(options), "application/json"),
                    "file": (image_path.split("/")[-1], image_file, "image/jpeg"),
                }

                response = requests.post(server_url, files=files)
                response.raise_for_status()
                result = response.json()

            # Verifica se o processamento foi bem-sucedido
            exit_code = result.get("data", {}).get("exit", {}).get("code", -1)
            stderr_msg = result.get("data", {}).get("stderr", "").strip()
            stdout_text = result.get("data", {}).get("stdout", "").strip()

            if exit_code == 0:
                # Se o processamento foi bem-sucedido, ignoramos stderr e retornamos apenas stdout
                text_output = stdout_text
            else:
                # Se houver erro real, incluímos stderr na saída
                text_output = f"Erro no OCR: {stderr_msg}"

        except FileNotFoundError:
            text_output = f"Erro: O arquivo '{image_path}' não foi encontrado."
        except requests.RequestException as e:
            text_output = f"Erro na requisição: {str(e)}"

        return Data(data={"ocr_text": text_output})
